metadata.Title: CVE-2018-14347 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description:
GNU Libextractor before 1.7 contains an infinite loop vulnerability inEXTRACTOR_mpeg_extract_method (mpeg_extractor.c).

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-14347` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

extract - 1:1.3-4+deb9u3build0.16.04.1
libextractor3 - 1:1.3-4+deb9u3build0.16.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libextractor package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1:1.3-4+deb9u3build0.16.04.1').
